data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Cauca. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cauca, Colombia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Cauca to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Father, for those in trouble in the state of Cauca prompt them to call on you for rescue today.
data.verse: He will call on me, and I will answer him; I will be with him in trouble, I will deliver him and honor him.

data.prayer: Jesus, please help the 160,102 believers in the state of Cauca to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, knowing that teachers will be judged more strictly, help the local leaders in Cauca, Colombia to be careful with their words.
data.verse: Not many of you should become teachers, my brothers, for you know that we who teach will be judged with greater strictness.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Cauca, Colombia a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.prayer: Over 6.43 percent of the people of Cauca are far from Jesus.
